div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 315 Velestinon, near Volos, Thessaly, 1966 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. (Oeconomides) Contents: 203+ AR Thessalian League: double-vict. Disposition: Athens 84; Volos 119 Theocharis, A Delt 1967, Chronika, p. 296 To be published by M. Oeconomides
